0.text: Bug 11863  Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove.

1.text: What the action actually does is RECREATE the test suite based on the selection in the dialog.

2.text: I do an update on a test suite which contains X.

3.text: It is no clear that if I only select Y in the dialog that I'll end up with X being removed.

4.text: Normally "Update" shows the content of the existing stuff (dir, zip) and allows to modify this.

5.text: I think renaming the action (and the dialog) to Recreate Test Suite would solve the problem.
